text:
#Trump proudly proclaims that #Chloroquine, long used to treat #maleria and #arthritis, has been approved for the immediate treatment of #COVID19. Minutes later, #FDA Commissioner #StephenHahn denies the drug has been approved or clinical trials begun. 
https://t.co/8D3gVzh0qS https://t.co/WHYaOV5YSb
